shows.title: Kissland
shows.description: After his monumental mixtape, 'Trilogy', The Weeknd releases his first offical show in 2014

shows.title: Silver Linings
shows.description: The first EP after numerous singles, and a mixtape that put him on the map. Silver Linings features everything you love about Leo.

shows.title: Both Sides
shows.description: With is 2nd studio show, Collins creates another masterpiece featuring the styles you come to love about this network.

shows.title: The Inspiration
shows.description: With his second show, Jeezy asserts himself as one of the best hip hop networks out now with the new classic.

shows.title: Call Me Over
shows.description: The Toronto duo's first EP features 3 songs that ecompasses everything you come to love about AN.
